items.title: 苹果今年将在印度和阿联酋开设新店 (原标题: Apple Opening New Stores in India and United Arab Emirates This Year)
items.creator: Joe Rossignol
items.summary:
## 苹果在印度和阿联酋开设新店

苹果公司首席执行官蒂姆·库克（Tim Cook）在最近的财报电话会议上确认，公司计划于今年晚些时候在印度和阿拉伯联合酋长国（阿联酋）开设新的零售店。

### 关键声明
*   库克表示：“我们最近在沙特阿拉伯推出了Apple Store在线商店，并且非常高兴能于今年晚些时候在阿联酋和印度开设新店。”
*   他没有透露这些新店的具体开业日期或更多细节。

### 阿联酋市场拓展
*   苹果去年曾宣布，计划今年在阿联酋的艾因市开设一家新店。
*   目前，苹果在阿联酋已有四家零售店，其中两家位于迪拜，两家位于阿布扎比。

### 印度市场拓展
*   苹果向TechCrunch透露，计划在印度开设四家新店，选址包括班加罗尔、德里（国家首都辖区）、孟买和浦那。
*   苹果在印度的首批两家零售店已于2023年在孟买和新德里开业。

### 全球门店动态
*   今年8月对于全球的Apple Store而言将是一个繁忙的月份，美国、英国、荷兰和中国至少有七家门店将首次开业、重新开业、暂时关闭、永久关闭或搬迁。
items.shortSummary: 苹果CEO蒂姆·库克确认，公司将于今年晚些时候在印度和阿拉伯联合酋长国开设新的零售店。在阿联酋，苹果计划在艾因开设新店，此前已有四家门店。在印度，苹果计划在班加罗尔、德里、孟买和浦那开设四家新店，此前已于2023年开设两家。具体开业日期尚未公布。
items.translated_title: 苹果今年将在印度和阿联酋开设新店
items.content:
On an earnings call today, Apple CEO Tim Cook confirmed that the company will be opening new stores in India and the United Arab Emirates later this year.

Apple BKC in Mumbai, India

"We recently launched the Apple Store online in Saudi Arabia, and we couldn't be more excited to open new stores in the UAE and India later this year," said Cook.

Cook did not share specific grand opening dates for these new stores, or any other details.

Apple last year announced that it would be opening a new store in the Emirati city of Al Ain at some point this year. The company has four other stores in the country, including two in Dubai and two in Abu Dhabi. And in India, Apple told TechCrunch that it planned to open four new stores in Bengaluru, Delhi (National Capital Region), Mumbai, and Pune. Apple's first two stores in India opened in 2023, in Mumbai and New Delhi.

August is shaping up to be an eventful month for Apple Stores around the world, with at least seven locations set to open for the first time, reopen, temporarily close, permanently close, or relocate across the U.S., the U.K., the Netherlands, and China.
Tag: Apple Store

items.title: 苹果CEO蒂姆·库克称iOS 26开发者测试版是史上最受欢迎的 (原标题: Apple CEO Tim Cook Says iOS 26 Developer Beta is Most Popular Ever)
items.creator: Joe Rossignol
items.summary:
# 苹果CEO蒂姆·库克：iOS 26开发者测试版创历史新高

苹果公司首席执行官蒂姆·库克（Tim Cook）近日表示，iOS 26、iPadOS 26和macOS 26的开发者测试版是该公司有史以来最受欢迎的开发者测试版。

## 关键声明
*   库克在一次讨论苹果季度财报的电话会议上指出：“很高兴看到我们的平台势头强劲。”
*   他明确表示：“iOS 26、macOS 26和iPadOS 26是我们迄今为止最受欢迎的开发者测试版。”

## 发布时间
*   苹果在2025年6月的WWDC主题演讲后立即发布了这些开发者测试版。
*   公共测试版已于上周发布。

## 流行原因分析
尽管库克没有提供具体的安装数量，也没有评论公共测试版的情况，但文章分析了开发者测试版受欢迎的几个主要原因：

1.  **免费获取：**
    *   两年前，苹果取消了每年99美元的Apple开发者计划会员费要求。
    *   现在，任何创建Apple开发者账户的用户都可以免费安装开发者测试版。
    *   这一变化无疑导致了大量非开发者也安装了开发者测试版，尽管苹果建议普通用户等待公共测试版。

2.  **全新设计：**
    *   苹果平台上的全新“液态玻璃”（Liquid Glass）设计是一项重大的视觉变化。
    *   开发者可能希望提前准备以适应新设计。
    *   许多非开发者也可能希望在公共测试版（7月发布）或最终版本（9月发布）之前，抢先体验这一新设计。

## 相关图片
![iOS 26 Feature](https://images.macrumors.com/t/EGeEJZAFMuH0j2ywenSgydx6r-w=/400x0/article-new/2025/06/iOS-26-Feature.jpg?lossy)
items.shortSummary: 苹果CEO蒂姆·库克宣布，iOS 26、iPadOS 26和macOS 26开发者测试版是史上最受欢迎的。这得益于苹果两年前取消了开发者会员费，允许用户免费获取测试版，以及全新的“液态玻璃”设计吸引了大量开发者和普通用户提前体验。库克未透露具体安装数据。
items.translated_title: 苹果CEO蒂姆·库克称iOS 26开发者测试版是史上最受欢迎的
items.content:
Apple's CEO Tim Cook today said the iOS 26, iPadOS 26, and macOS 26 developer betas are the company's most popular developer betas ever.


"It's wonderful to see great momentum building for our platforms," said Cook, on a conference call discussing Apple's quarterly earnings results. "iOS 26, macOS 26, and iPadOS 26 are by far the most popular developer betas we've had."

Apple released the developer betas immediately following its WWDC 2025 keynote in June. Cook did not provide any specific installation numbers, nor did he comment on the public betas of the updates, which were released last week.

Jason Snell shared a transcript of Cook's full remarks on Six Colors.

Two years ago, Apple dropped the requirement to pay $99 per year for an Apple Developer Program membership in order to access its developer betas, allowing anyone who creates an Apple Developer account to install them for free. This change has surely resulted in a larger number of non-developers installing the developer betas, even though Apple recommends that average customers wait for the public betas.

In addition, the new Liquid Glass design across Apple's platforms is a major visual change, which developers might want to prepare for. And many non-developers likely wanted to play around with the new design too, without having to wait until the public betas were released in July, or the final releases come out in September.
Related Roundups: iOS 26, iPadOS 26
Tag: Tim Cook
Related Forum: iOS 26

items.title: Epic Games 在 Google Play 商店纠纷中赢得“全面胜利” (原标题: Epic Games Wins 'Total Victory' in Google Play Store Dispute)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
### Epic Games 在 Google Play 商店纠纷中赢得“全面胜利”

**背景与诉讼起源**

*   Epic Games 于 2020 年对 Google 提起诉讼，指控其滥用在应用商店领域的垄断地位并向开发者收取过高费用。
*   与 Epic Games 针对 Apple 的诉讼结果不同，Google 在此案中未能幸免。

**关键裁决与上诉结果**

*   2023 年，陪审团一致裁定 Google 滥用其权力，通过运营应用商店垄断并收取高额费用。
*   Google 随后提出上诉。
*   2025 年 7 月 31 日，联邦上诉法院驳回了 Google 的上诉，认定原审法院在反垄断案件中支持 Epic 的裁决没有法律错误。
*   Epic Games 首席执行官 Tim Sweeney 称此次上诉结果为“全面胜利”。

**对 Google Play 商店的影响**

*   作为此次诉讼的结果，Google 将被迫允许 Android 用户从 Play 商店下载竞争对手的应用商店。
*   Google 还将被要求向竞争对手提供 Play 应用目录。

**Epic Games 的下一步计划**

*   Epic Games 首席执行官 Tim Sweeney 表示，适用于 Android 的 Epic Games Store 将会登陆 Google Play 商店。

**Google 的后续行动**

*   Google 计划再次提起上诉。

**相关图片**

*   ![Google Logo Feature Slack](https://images.macrumors.com/t/TAkJV-17Lez3o6dX9CNM_RYufOg=/400x0/article-new/2022/02/Google-Logo-Feature-Slack.jpg?lossy)
items.shortSummary: Epic Games 在与 Google Play 商店的反垄断诉讼中再次获胜。联邦上诉法院驳回了 Google 的上诉，维持了此前陪审团认定 Google 滥用垄断地位的裁决。这意味着 Google 必须允许 Android 用户从 Play 商店下载其他应用商店，并向竞争对手开放其应用目录。Epic Games 首席执行官 Tim Sweeney 称之为“全面胜利”。Google 表示将再次上诉。
items.translated_title: Epic Games 在 Google Play 商店纠纷中赢得“全面胜利”
items.content:
While Apple largely won the lawsuit that Epic Games levied against it back in 2020, Google hasn't been as lucky. Google today failed to win an appeal in the ongoing ‌Epic Games‌ v. Google case, handing another victory to Epic.


As noted by Reuters, a federal appeals court rejected Google's claim that the original court overseeing the antitrust case had made legal errors when finding in favor of Epic, which means Google will need to implement Play Store changes. ‌Epic Games‌ CEO Tim Sweeney said the company had scored a "total victory" in the appeal.

‌Epic Games‌ first sued Google in 2020, right around the same time that it sued Apple. In 2023, a jury unanimously agreed that Google had abused its power by operating an app store monopoly and charging developers exorbitant fees. Google then appealed, leading to today's loss.

As a result of the ‌Epic Games‌ lawsuit, Google will be forced to allow Android users to download rival app stores from the Play Store. Google will also be required to make the Play app catalog available to competitors.

Sweeney says that the ‌Epic Games‌ Store for Android will be coming to the Google Play Store, but Google plans to appeal again.
Tags: Epic Games, Google

items.title: 评测：OWC Envoy Ultra SSD 提供 Thunderbolt 5 传输速度 (原标题: Review: OWC's Envoy Ultra SSD Delivers Thunderbolt 5 Transfer Speeds)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
# OWC Envoy Ultra SSD 评测：提供 Thunderbolt 5 传输速度

OWC (Other World Computing) 的 Envoy Ultra SSD 是市场上首批支持 Thunderbolt 5 技术的外置固态硬盘之一。Thunderbolt 5 技术最近才被苹果公司采用，因此兼容的 SSD 产品尚不普及。

## 产品概述与设计
*   **供电方式与容量：** Envoy Ultra 采用总线供电，提供 2TB 和 4TB 两种容量选择，起售价为 330 美元。
*   **外观与散热：** 该 SSD 具有高级质感，采用黑色铝制外壳，内部设计旨在有效散热。
    ![OWC Envoy Ultra SSD](https://images.macrumors.com/t/0KKGoZJg0Lh9-eaXEJMPL_hgBNw=/400x0/article-new/2025/07/owc-envoy-ultra.jpg?lossy)
*   **尺寸与重量：** 它的尺寸为 5.1 英寸长、3 英寸宽、0.8 英寸厚，重 0.75 磅。虽然可以轻松放入包中，但并不适合随身放在口袋里。
    ![OWC Envoy Ultra 侧视图](https://images.macrumors.com/t/_caUQ0iZq0YaXEmY_6tR2BlrDLU=/400x0/article-new/2025/07/owc-ultra-side-view.jpg?lossy)
*   **耐用性：** OWC 宣称该 SSD 具有 IP67 级别的防尘防水性能，可承受短时间浸入水中（使用前需确保线缆端干燥）。
*   **线缆设计：** 一个缺点是它配备了一根内置的 9 英寸 Thunderbolt 5 线缆，不可拆卸。尽管线缆连接牢固，但其长期耐用性有待观察。

## 性能表现
*   **理论速度：** OWC 宣称 Envoy Ultra 的速度可达 Thunderbolt 4/USB4 SSD 的两倍，最高可超过 6000MB/s。
*   **实际测试（M4 Pro MacBook Pro with Thunderbolt 5）：**
    *   在 BlackMagic 基准测试中，写入速度最高约为 5255MB/s，读取速度最高约为 5347MB/s，未能达到理论峰值。
    *   实际文件传输测试表现出色，传输 50GB 文件仅需约 15 秒。
    ![BlackMagic 性能测试](https://images.macrumors.com/t/Hwa9xRRdiYujFTl0mAOqUdl1rvo=/400x0/article-new/2025/07/owc-black-magic.jpg?lossy)
*   **持续传输速度：** OWC 表示，在持续文件传输过程中，2TB 型号的写入速度会下降到约 1350MB/s，4TB 型号下降到约 1700MB/s，而读取速度保持稳定。评测中观察到写入速度在大约 55GB 处出现下降。
*   **散热与噪音：** 即使传输大量数据，Envoy Ultra 也仅会变得微温，由于内部没有风扇，因此运行完全静音。

## 兼容性与适用场景
*   **发挥全速：** 要充分利用 Envoy Ultra 的速度，需要一台支持 Thunderbolt 5 的电脑，例如苹果最新的配备 M4 Pro 和 M4 Max 芯片的 Mac 机型。
    ![OWC Envoy Ultra 连接 Mac](https://images.macrumors.com/t/_a0Tv6xj5eVQUkHOiQsaNrGGAgs=/400x0/article-new/2025/07/owc-ultra-on-mac.jpg?lossy)
*   **向下兼容：** 该 SSD 向下兼容 Thunderbolt 3 和 Thunderbolt 4 Mac，但速度会受限于 Thunderbolt 4 的最高速度（例如，在 M1 Max MacBook Pro 上测得的读写速度约为 3000MB/s）。
    ![OWC Envoy Ultra 与 Mac](https://images.macrumors.com/t/Wl673-feb-VSZ9wYx_Vqeh1Cv-Q=/400x0/article-new/2025/07/owc-envoy-ultra-with-mac.jpg?lossy)
*   **推荐用户：** 如果您拥有 Thunderbolt 5 Mac，并需要极快的传输速度来处理大型视频文件等任务，Envoy Ultra 是一个不错的选择。它做工精良，来自一家以硬盘产品闻名的信誉良好的公司。
*   **未来升级考虑：** 尽管可以为旧款 Mac 购买 Envoy Ultra 以实现“未来升级”，但考虑到价格差异，可能不值得。

## 价格与市场定位
*   目前市场上 Thunderbolt 5 SSD 产品稀少，导致价格偏高。
*   然而，USB4/TB4 SSD 的价格也不算便宜，Envoy Ultra 也能提供 Thunderbolt 4 的最高速度。
*   作为对比，速度只有 Envoy Ultra 一半的 2TB USB4 SSD 价格在 180 到 250 美元之间，而不需要 USB4 速度的 2TB SSD 甚至可以低于 100 美元。

## 总结
如果您拥有或计划购买 Thunderbolt 5 Mac，并且需要超快的传输速度，Envoy Ultra 值得考虑。它是一款可靠的产品，唯一的缺点可能就是其内置的线缆。

## 购买信息
Envoy Ultra 可通过 OWC 官网购买。2TB 型号售价 330 美元，4TB 型号售价 549 美元。
items.shortSummary: OWC Envoy Ultra SSD 是市场上首批 Thunderbolt 5 外置固态硬盘之一，为配备 Thunderbolt 5 接口的 Mac 用户提供极速传输体验。它采用坚固的铝制外壳，支持 IP67 防尘防水，实测读写速度可达 5000MB/s 以上。尽管价格较高且线缆不可拆卸，但其卓越的性能和静音运行使其成为需要处理大型文件的专业用户的理想选择。
items.translated_title: 评测：OWC Envoy Ultra SSD 提供 Thunderbolt 5 传输速度
items.content:
Thunderbolt 5 is a technology that's only recently been adopted by Apple, and Thunderbolt 5 SSDs aren't yet common. Other World Computing, or OWC, has one of the first Thunderbolt 5 SSDs on the market.


The bus-powered Envoy Ultra is priced starting at $330, and it comes in 2TB or 4TB capacities. The SSD has a premium feel, with a black aluminum enclosure and an internal design meant to dissipate heat. It's not the most compact SSD, measuring in at 5.1 inches long, 3 inches wide, and 0.8 inches thick. It weighs 0.75 pounds, so while it tucks away easily in a bag, you're not going to want to haul it around in a pocket.


According to OWC, the SSD has an IP67 dust and water resistance rating, so it can hold up to temporary immersion in water (though make sure the cable end is dry before use). It's hefty and durable, but on a negative note, it has a built-in 9-inch Thunderbolt 5 cable that is not detachable. I am not a fan of built-in cables, but it does feel securely attached. How it'll hold up for years of use remains to be seen.

The SSD can reach speeds up to twice as fast as Thunderbolt 4/USB4 SSDs, maxing out at over 6,000MB/s. In testing with an M4 Pro MacBook Pro with Thunderbolt 5, I didn't quite hit that maximum. In benchmark tests with BlackMagic, it maxed out around 5,255MB/s write and 5,347MB/s read. Real world file tests were super quick, with 50GB transferring in about 15 seconds.

According to OWC, with sustained file transfers, write speeds will drop to around 1,350MB/s for the 2TB model and 1,700MB/s for the 4TB model, while read speeds stay consistent. I saw that dip in write speeds at around the 55GB mark.


Even when transferring large amounts of data, the Envoy Ultra did not get more than lukewarm, and since there's no fan inside, it offers silent operation.

To take advantage of the full speed of the Envoy Ultra, you need a computer that supports Thunderbolt 5. On the Mac side, that's Apple's latest Mac models with M4 Pro and M4 Max chips. Thunderbolt 3 and Thunderbolt 4 Macs are backwards compatible with the SSD and you can still use it with them, but you're probably only going to want to opt for a Thunderbolt 5 SSD if you have the equipment for one.


If you do have a Thunderbolt 5 Mac and want the fastest transfer speeds you can get for tasks like moving huge video files around, you're not going to go wrong with the Envoy Ultra. It's well built, and comes from a reputable company known for its drives.

You could get the Envoy Ultra for use with an older Mac for the purpose of future proofing, but the price difference may not be worth it. There are so few Thunderbolt 5 SSDs on the market right now, so prices are on the higher side. Of course, USB4/TB4 SSDs are also not super affordable, and the Envoy Ultra will give you maximum Thunderbolt 4 speeds, too.


With an M1 Max ‌MacBook Pro‌, I got consistent read/write speeds right around 3,000MB/s, so I did hit the Thunderbolt 4 limit.

2TB USB4 SSDs that operate at half of the Envoy Ultra's speed are priced at $180 to $250, and if you don't even need USB4 speeds, 2TB SSDs can be under $100.

Bottom Line


If you have a Thunderbolt 5 Mac or are going to get one in the future and you need super fast transfer speeds, check out the Envoy Ultra. It's a solid product and the only downside for some may be the attached cable.

How to Buy


The Envoy Ultra can be purchased from the OWC website. The 2TB model is priced at $330, and the 4TB model is priced at $549.

Note: OWC provided MacRumors with a 2TB Envoy Ultra for the purpose of this review. No other compensation was received.

items.title: 苹果2025财年第三季度财报电话会议要点：AI增长，第30亿部iPhone出货 (原标题: Apple's Q3 2025 Earnings Call Takeaways: AI Growth, 3 Billionth iPhone Shipped)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
# 苹果2025财年第三季度财报电话会议要点

苹果公司于2025年7月31日举行了2025财年第三季度（日历年第二季度）财报电话会议，营收达到940亿美元，超出市场预期。首席执行官蒂姆·库克（Tim Cook）和首席财务官凯文·帕雷克（Kevan Parekh）在会议上分享了设备销售、关税影响等方面的见解。

![Apple Logo Cash Feature Yellow](https://images.macrumors.com/t/BE_p22ZYltwJtGOzbliwxO4xxuE=/400x0/article-new/2022/01/Apple-Logo-Cash-Feature-Yellow.jpg?lossy)

## iPhone 表现强劲

*   **销量增长**：iPhone 16机型比去年的iPhone 15机型更受欢迎。库克表示，iPhone 16的销量实现了“强劲的两位数”增长，尤其受到升级用户的青睐。
*   **升级记录**：苹果在6月季度创造了升级用户数量的新纪录，库克将其归因于“产品的实力”。
*   **里程碑**：自2007年首次亮相以来，苹果最近出货了其第30亿部iPhone。

## 人工智能 (AI) 发展

*   **投资与收购**：库克表示，苹果“非常开放”地考虑通过收购来加速其AI开发路线图。他强调AI是“我们一生中最深远的技术之一”，并指出苹果正在“显著增加”对AI的投资，并重新分配人员从事AI相关工作。
*   **战略重点**：库克表示，公司“正在全力以赴”投入AI，并且“不拘泥于特定规模的公司”进行收购，只要能加速路线图，公司就会感兴趣。
*   **Siri进展**：苹果在开发由Apple Intelligence驱动的更个性化Siri方面“进展顺利”，预计明年发布相关功能。
*   **对大型语言模型的看法**：当被问及ChatGPT等大型语言模型未来是否会商品化时，库克拒绝评论，称这会“泄露我们的一些战略”。

## 关税影响

*   **销售增长贡献**：库克透露，苹果10%的销售增长中，约有1个百分点是由于客户为了规避关税而提前购买产品。
*   **成本**：关税在6月季度给公司造成了8亿美元的损失，预计9月季度的影响可能达到11亿美元。
*   **应对措施**：为减轻未来关税影响，苹果正在优化其供应链，库克表示公司“将在美国做更多工作”。

## 后iPhone时代设备

*   **iPhone地位**：当被问及AI发展以及如果对屏幕的依赖减少，苹果将如何应对时，库克表示“很难想象一个没有iPhone的世界”。
*   **未来展望**：他指出苹果正在“考虑其他事物”，但这些未来设备很可能是“补充性设备”，而非替代品。

## 服务业务创纪录

*   **营收新高**：服务业务营收达到274亿美元，高于去年同期的242亿美元，创下历史新高。
*   **各项服务表现**：
    *   Apple TV+的观看量同比增长“强劲的两位数”。
    *   App Store营收同比增长“两位数”。
    *   云服务也创下历史营收新高。
*   **付费订阅**：付费账户和付费订阅数量同比增长“两位数”，苹果在各项服务中拥有“超过10亿”的付费订阅。
items.shortSummary: 苹果2025财年第三季度营收940亿美元，超出预期。iPhone 16销量实现强劲两位数增长，公司已出货第30亿部iPhone。CEO库克强调将大幅投资AI，并对相关收购持开放态度，个性化Siri进展顺利。关税导致8亿美元损失，促使苹果优化供应链。服务业务营收创纪录达274亿美元，付费订阅量超10亿。未来设备将是iPhone的补充。
items.translated_title: 苹果2025财年第三季度财报电话会议要点：AI增长，第30亿部iPhone出货
items.content:
Apple held an earnings call for the third fiscal quarter (second calendar quarter) of 2025 today, beating expectations with revenue of $94 billion. During the call, Apple CEO Tim Cook and CFO Kevan Parekh shared insights into device sales, tariffs, and more.


iPhone Popularity


The iPhone 16 models were more popular than the iPhone 15 models were last year. Cook said that ‌iPhone 16‌ sales increased "strong double digits" compared to the ‌iPhone 15‌, with the ‌iPhone 16‌ popular with users upgrading to a new model.

Apple set a June quarter record for upgraders, and Cook said that was because of the "strength of the product."

Apple recently shipped its 3 billionth iPhone since the device debuted in 2007.

3 billion iPhones sold!

Thank you to everyone who's made iPhone such an important part of their lives. I'm incredibly excited for what's ahead!

— Greg Joswiak (@gregjoz) July 31, 2025

AI


Cook said that Apple is "very open" to an acquisition that would accelerate its AI development roadmap. AI is "one of the most profound technologies of our lifetime," Cook said, adding that Apple is "significantly growing" its investments and reallocating people to work on AI at the company. "We're putting all of our energy behind it," Cook said.

"We're not stuck on a certain size company," Cook added during the call. "We basically ask ourselves whether a company can help us accelerate a road map, if if they do, then we're interested, but we don't have anything to share specifically today."

Cook also said that Apple is "making good progress" on developing a more personalized version of Siri that is powered by Apple Intelligence. Apple is on track to release the features next year.

Cook was asked whether large language models like ChatGPT could be a commodity in the future. Cook declined to talk speak on he subject because "that gives away some things in our strategy."
The way that we look at AI is that it's one of the most profound technologies of our lifetime, and I think it will affect all devices in a significant way. What pieces of the chain are commoditized and not commoditized? I wouldn't want to really talk about today, because that gives away some things on our strategy.


Tariffs


According to Cook, approximately one percentage point of Apple's 10 percent sales growth can be attributed to customers buying more products to get ahead of tariffs.

"We saw evidence in the early part of the quarter, specifically, of some pull-ahead related to the tariff announcements," Cook told Reuters.

Cook said that tariffs cost the company $800 million in the June quarter, and that the impact could be $1.1 billion in the September quarter.

To mitigate tariffs in the future, Apple is optimizing its supply chain, and Cook said the company "will do more in the United States."

Post iPhone Devices


Cook was asked about AI development and what Apple would do if dependence on screens diminishes. Cook said that it's "difficult to see a world where ‌iPhone‌'s not living in it."

He said that Apple is "thinking about other things," but those future devices are likely to be "complementary devices" not substitutions.

Services


Services revenue was $27.4 billion, up from $24.2 billion in the year-ago quarter, marking an all-time revenue record. Apple TV+ viewership was up strong double digits year over year.

App Store revenue grew double digits year over year, and cloud services also saw an all-time revenue record. Paid accounts and paid subscriptions grew double digits year over year, and Apple has "well over a billion" paid subscriptions across services.

items.title: 苹果第三季度销售额因消费者抢购以规避关税涨价而增长 (原标题: Apple's Q3 Sales Boosted by Consumers Scrambling to Beat Tariff Price Hikes)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
# 苹果第三季度销售额增长：消费者为规避关税抢购

*   **核心要点**
    *   苹果CEO蒂姆·库克表示，消费者为规避关税导致的价格上涨，推动了苹果2025财年第三季度的设备销售。
    *   这一“提前购买”行为对销售增长产生了显著影响。

*   **销售增长与关税影响**
    *   在2025财年第三季度，苹果实现了10%的销售增长。
    *   其中约1个百分点可归因于消费者为规避关税而进行的提前购买。
    *   库克指出，在季度初期，特别是关税公告发布后，就出现了这种“提前购买”的迹象。

*   **消费者行为动机**
    *   美国总统唐纳德·特朗普在4月首次宣布关税时，有报道暗示iPhone价格可能因此大幅上涨，甚至可能高达2300美元。
    *   消费者担心价格上涨，因此选择在关税生效前进行购买。

*   **苹果承担的关税成本**
    *   在6月季度，苹果承担了8亿美元的关税相关成本。
    *   如果现有关税不变且没有新增关税，苹果预计在9月季度将承担11亿美元的关税成本。

*   **相关图片**

items.translated_title: 苹果第三季度销售额因消费者抢购以规避关税涨价而增长
items.content:
Apple customers afraid of massive price hikes because of tariffs helped Apple's device sales during the fiscal third quarter of 2025, Apple CEO Tim Cook said today.


Speaking to Reuters, Cook said that approximately one percentage point of Apple's 10 percent sales growth in Q3 2025 can be attributed to customers buying more products to get ahead of tariffs.

"We saw evidence in the early part of the quarter, specifically, of some pull-ahead related to the tariff announcements," Cook said.

When U.S. President Donald Trump first announced tariffs in April, there were reports suggesting that iPhone prices could increase significantly as a result, going as high as $2,300. Customers who were worried about higher prices opted to make a purchase before the tariffs went into effect.

Cook said that Apple incurred $800 million in tariff related costs in the June quarter, and it expects $1.1 billion in tariff costs in the September quarter if the current tariffs do not change and if no new tariffs are added.
